title: Switch
lyrics:
Hit that switch
Gotta it pour up for the niggas I miss (yeah)
Mama I'm rich
I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)
Look at my bitch
Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (yeah)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit (What's happenin) Hit that switch

Gotta pour it up for the niggas I miss (yeah)

Mama I'm rich

I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)

Look at my bitch

Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (Ahh)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit



Yeah, Look at my wrist (Wrist)

Cool 5k I done spent on my fit (5K)

Yeah, Nigga I'm lit

Gotta bitch from the burbs, gotta bitch from the bricks (From the bricks) Yeah, you ain't talkin bout shit

Been had hits, better switch up yo pitch (yo pitch)

Know niggas hitting licks

She gon let me fuck, but I swear I won't lick (Can't lick)

Yeah, all gold Rollie

Been had cheese, big bread like Hoagie (Like a Hoagie)

Nigga you don't know me

Freaky lil bih, but she swear that she Holy (Lil bitch)

Yeah, can't hold me

That nigga lame, blocking shit like a goalie (Block shit Block shit)

That nigga bogus

Say you getting money, well you know you gotta show me (Gotta show me)



Hit that switch

Gotta pour it up for the niggas I miss (yeah)

Mama I'm rich

I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)

Look at my bitch

Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (yeah)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit (What's happenin) Hit that switch

Gotta pour it up for the niggas I miss (yeah)

Mama I'm rich

I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)

Look at my bitch

Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (Ahh)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit



Yeah, I'm here (Here)

Diamonds on my neck and my wrist real clear (Real clear) (Ice)

Reappear

New hat trick, make you hoes disappear (Disappear) (Where she at?) (OK)

Get in there

Bitch keep naggin, but I swear I don't care (Swear I don't care)

Yeah, who there?

Too much pain, I done ran outta tears (No Cap)

Yeah, Hot shot (Shot)

Louie 13, smoke out the drop top (Drop top) (Skurrt)

Yeah, take a look at my watch

Nigga say he poppin, but I swear he not hot (Not hot)

Where Keke, bought my bitch CC

Shawty want dick, cause she see me on TV

Don't tease me

Thought you ain't need me

Pay for the dick, I ain't giving out freebies (No freebies)

No Zeze, covered like a Teepee

Tryna hit Brit and I'm tryna hit Riri

Too easy, trap like Jeezy

Yeah the pussy good, but the money really please me (Make love to the money) I'm all on it

Say you want smoke, but you really don't want it

Feeling like Tony

Can't stay faithful with these hoes all on me (What's happenin)



Hit that switch

Gotta pour it up for the niggas I miss (yeah)

Mama I'm rich

I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)

Look at my bitch

Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (yeah)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit (What's happenin) Hit that switch

Gotta pour it up for the niggas I miss (yeah)

Mama I'm rich

I done lost count, all these hoes I hit (yeah)

Look at my bitch

Shit get real she gon hide them sticks (Ahh) (Look)

All gold bricks

Can't a hoe tell me I ain't on my shit
